name: Bloodsecrator

abilities.name: Portal of Skulls
abilities.description: Put the hero dice here until the end of the round. While it is there, the Bloodsecrator cannot move, but his Wrath of Khorne weapon action has a Damage of D3 rather than 1. In addition, other players in the party can choose to re-roll any failed attack rolls and any D3 or D6 damage rolls for their heroes.

renown: If you slay any adveraries during your turn with the Wrath of Khorne, gain 1 renown.
